![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9d85f60cfd2f1e9f41a53e190cfaf5b0.png)

We can take apart $\green{10}$ to make $\pink8$ and $\blue2$.  
We can put together $\pink8$ and $\blue2$ to make $\green{10}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$10-8=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $8=10$
